attributes.action: Deal with Mr Kevin Stephen Gallacher and the issues associated with him .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That Gordon Brown face up to his responsibilty to deal with the "Mr Kevin Stephen Gallacher" affair and its associated issues judiciously and immediately .

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
